import React from 'react'; // Projenizin backend'inde tanƒ±mladƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ±z Microsoft baƒülantƒ± URL'si const MICROSOFT_CONNECT_URL = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/connect/microsoft'; // --- G√úNCELLENMƒ∞≈û Fƒ∞YATLANDIRMA VE Lƒ∞Mƒ∞TLER --- // Kullanƒ±cƒ±nƒ±n istediƒüi 4 plan (Free, Basic, Pro, Exclusive) bu yapƒ±yƒ± kullanƒ±r const PRICING_LIMITS = [ { level: 'Basic', description: 'Ideal for small projects and solo professionals who need reliability.', price: '$10/month', syncs: 3, interval: '1 Hour', cta: 'Log in to Subscribe', isPrimary: false, features: [ "Two-way Synchronization (Notion ‚Üî Excel)", "3 Auto Sync Jobs (Notion ‚Üî Excel)", "Every 1 Hour Sync Interval", "Unlimited Manual Syncs", ], }, { level: 'Pro', description: 'Our most popular plan. Perfect for growing teams and serious data workflows.', price: '$20/month', syncs: 10, interval: '30 Minutes', cta: 'Log in to Subscribe', isPrimary: true, // EN √áOK TAVSƒ∞YE EDƒ∞LEN PLAN features: [ "Two-way Synchronization (Notion ‚Üî Excel)", "10 Auto Sync Jobs (Notion ‚Üî Excel)", "Every 30 Minutes Sync Interval", "Unlimited Manual Syncs", ], }, { level: 'Exclusive', description: 'For large organizations and mission-critical, real-time data reporting.', price: '$50/month', syncs: 'Unlimited', interval: '15 Minutes', cta: 'Log in to Subscribe', isPrimary: false, features: [ "Two-way Synchronization (Notion ‚Üî Excel)", "Unlimited Auto Sync Jobs (Notion ‚Üî Excel)", "Every 15 Minutes Sync Interval", "Unlimited Manual Syncs", ], }, ]; // ------------------------------------------ // SSS Listesi const FAQ_ITEMS = [ { question: 'How secure is my data?', answer: 'Your data is highly secure. We use the official Microsoft Graph API and Notion API for all data transfer. We do not store your actual data (Excel cell contents or Notion page content), only the necessary tokens and synchronization configurations.', }, { question: 'Do I need to pay for Notion or Excel?', answer: 'Yes. NotiXel is a synchronization tool. You must have active accounts for both Microsoft 365 (to use Excel online with OneDrive) and Notion to use our service.', }, { question: 'What happens if I change a column name in Excel?', answer: 'NotiXel uses a unique mapping ID to link your Excel columns and Notion properties. If you change a name, you may need to re-map the column in your NotiXel Dashboard.', }, { question: 'Is the sync truly bi-directional?', answer: 'Yes. You can configure a sync to push changes from Excel to Notion, and a separate sync to push changes from Notion to Excel. You can even set them to run at different intervals.', }, ]; /** * Ana sayfa i√ßeriƒüini (global header ve footer hari√ß) render eden bile≈üendir. * setStep prop'unu almasƒ± gereklidir, ancak ≈üimdilik anchor linkler yeterlidir. */ const Home: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* 2. HERO B√ñL√úM√ú */}

Stop Copy-Pasting Data Between Notion and Excel.

Automate your data flow, keep reports up-to-date, and save hours every week. Setup takes less than a minute.

Start Now See How It Works
{/* Sync2Sheets'teki gibi bir g√∂rseliniz olduƒüunu varsayƒ±yoruz */}
{/* 3. TRUST BADGES / ENTEGRASYON VURGUSU */}

Trusted by teams who use:

{/* 4. ANA √ñZELLƒ∞KLER (NASIL √áALI≈ûIR) */}

Automate Your Data Flow in 3 Simple Steps

1

Connect

Securely link your Notion workspace and your Microsoft Excel file via official APIs. No complex setup or manual token handling.

2

Map Columns

Match your Excel columns to the corresponding Notion database properties. NotiXel can automatically create missing Notion columns for you.

3

Set Sync Interval

Select the sync direction (Excel ‚Üí Notion or Notion ‚Üí Excel) and Sit back and enjoy always up-to-date data.

{/* 5. EK VURGULANACAK √ñZELLƒ∞KLER (Sosyal Kanƒ±t yerine fayda) */}

Why Choose NotiXel?

‚öôÔ∏è Granular Column Sync

You decide exactly which Excel columns match which Notion properties. Sync only the data you need and leave the rest untouched.

üîë Dedicated Sync ID System

Each synchronized row is tracked with a unique ID, guaranteeing that NotiXel never updates the wrong record, even if you reorder your rows.

‚ö°Ô∏è Instant Manual Sync

Need a change pushed immediately? Run your configured sync job with a single click from the Dashboard, bypassing the auto-schedule.

{/* 6. Fƒ∞YATLANDIRMA B√ñL√úM√ú */}

Simple Pricing

Start syncing. Upgrade as your data needs grow.
